results.title: Cardioprotective effects of melatonin and metformin against doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity in rats are through preserving mitochondrial function and dynamics.
results.text_hl: Several pharmacological interventions which exert antioxidant properties, including @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, have demonstrated beneficial effects against various @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Anatomical</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020763 @@@cardiac pathological conditions@@@.

citations.NLM: Arinno A, Maneechote C, Khuanjing T, Ongnok B, Prathumsap N, Chunchai T, Arunsak B, Kerdphoo S, Shinlapawittayatorn K, Chattipakorn SC, Chattipakorn N. Cardioprotective effects of melatonin and metformin against doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity in rats are through preserving mitochondrial function and dynamics. Biochem Pharmacol. 2021 Oct;192():114743. PMID: 34453902

results.title: A benefit-harm analysis of adding basal insulin vs. sulfonylurea to metformin to manage type II diabetes mellitus in people with multiple chronic conditions.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to manage @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetes mellitus@@@ in people with multiple chronic @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Anatomical</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020763 @@@conditions@@@.

results.title: The hyperlactatemic effect of biguanides: a comparison between phenformin and metformin during a 6-month treatment.
results.text_hl: To compare the chronic hyperlactatemic effect of @CHEMICAL_Phenformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010629 @@@phenformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, we performed a double-blind study in 10 non @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-dependent @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ without any other known @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Anatomical</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020763 @@@hyperlactatemic condition@@@.

results.title: Acute and long-term effects of metformin on the function and insulin secretory responsiveness of clonal beta-cells.
results.text_hl: Concomitant culture with 200 mum @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ partially reversed many of the adverse effects of prolonged @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Anatomical</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020763 @@@glucotoxic conditions@@@.
